name: Knight of the Forgotten Realm
description:
Knight of the Forgotten Realm is a 2.5D side-scroller action adventure game set in a war torn-land. After an unprecedented attack on the Eyes of Humanity, a outpost in the far east that tracks the Ancient Ones, a god-like being known as an Eternal saves your life. In return, you must venture into the forbidden territory to uncover lost knowledge crucial to the realm. Will you survive the Eternal's call?

Knight of the Forgotten Realm features a visceral skill based combat system that is easy to learn, but hard to master. On your journey, you'll be able to discover history lost to decades of war, unlock numerous abilities, and encounter bosses that'll challenge even the most skilled knight. 

As Helthurius Games first commercial title, Knight of the Forgotten Realm provides a blueprint to a bigger title planned for the future. Your participation in the 4 planned Alpha tests, and most importantly the feedback you provide, is important and greatly appreciated. Every bit of feedback I've gotten for Knight of the Forgotten Realm has been beneficial to it's evolution and yours will be too.

Follow the project on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/HelthuriusGames

Subscribe to Helthurius Games on You Tube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCs1BOVmuQC-jMhsYeMS_sGA

Alpha Schedule:

Alpha 1: The Forbidden Forest - 3/17/2021

Alpha 2: The Realm Beyond - TBD

Alpha 3: The Cellar - TBD

Alpha 4: Uncharted Territory - TBD

Minimum System Requirements: 

CPU - AMD Ryzen 3 1200 4-Core 3.1 GHz (or Intel equivalent)

GPU - Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 4GB Video Card (or AMD equivalent)

RAM - 8 GB DDR3

Storage - 7200 RPM HDD with 2 GB available

Recommended System Requirements:

CPU - AMD Ryzen 5 3600X 6-Core 4.4 GHz (or Intel equivalent)

GPU - Nvidia GeForce GTX 1080 Ti 8GB Video Card (or AMD equivalent)

RAM - 16 GB DDR4 

Storage - SSD with 2 GB available

Note: The specs stated above and the range in-between has been tested. However, the game could potentially work on specs lower than the minimum. The goal of Helthurius Games is to optimize Knight of the Forgotten Realm even further, so any feedback as to how the game ran on your configuration is helpful.
